content.rendered:
LOCATED ADJACENT TO MTN’S HEAD OFFICE ON 14TH AVENUE – WITH SPECTACULAR VIEWS

Located at the base of Northcliff, neighbouring directly onto MTN’s 14th Avenue head offices, is a new concept in apartment living. Units were designed to be larger than competing apartments in the area, with stylish settings and finishes to contribute to the quality of life on offer. A dedicated onsite maintenance team and full-time security personnel ensure the safety and convenience of all residents. Other five-star experiences include free internet and monthly events, such as outdoor movies and themed evenings in the Lifestyle Hub. Units come with access to free internet and access to the clubhouse and gym.

Contact Brian
BROCHURE
ESTATE RULES
ESTATE VIDEO
ESTATE LOCATION

ESTATE FEATURES

Bachelor, 1-bed, 2-bed and 3-bed apartments for rent
Sizes range from 32m² – 80m²
Rent from R6,700pm – R12,600pm
Modern open plan layouts with quality finishes
Tight security with biometric fingerprint access
Best value for money lifestyle in the Northcliff area
Close proximity to retail centres
Free internet in each apartment
Care-free living as maintenance is included
Free weekly activities and social events for kids and adults

OUTDOOR FACILITIES

Walking Trails/Paths
Children’s Play Parks
Braai Facilities
Tennis Court
Swimming Pool & Splash Park
Multipurpose Sports Fields

INDOOR FACILITIES

Family Restaurant
Double-storey Gym (FREE Weekly Classes)
Sky Bar
Meeting Rooms
Laundromat

TAKE A LOOK AT SOME OF OUR LAYOUTS BELOW

5IVE ON THIRTEENTH IS ON SHOW 7 DAYS A WEEK FROM 9:00 UNTIL 17:00
